outline:
1. to despise, hold in contempt, disdain
    1. (Qal) to despise, regard with contempt
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be despised
      2. to be despicable
      3. to be vile, worthless
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to despise
kjv_def: despise, disdain, contemn(-ptible), [phrase] think to scorn, vile person.
